column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-11-04 20:27:56+00:00; ;1456357567710498816;en;2;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@AutieSpark No. It’s just that most people are NT
column3: and most NTs assume everyone feels
column4: responds and behaves like them. Anything outside the NT narrative often/sometimes doesn’t feel “real” to them.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. You can’t detach autism
column3: and most of us don’t want to. It is our entire neurology - how our brains and bodies are built
column4: how we experience the world
column5: how we think. Being autistic is nothing to be ashamed of
column6: and it isn’t a disorder.

column4: rather than detrimental to us as claimed in the last 24 hours.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-31 12:16:08+00:00; ;1454784251572916231;en;0;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@littlehux Sorry! I misread that. I am not saying it’s a cure all

column4: IMO. As someone with an enormous history of abuse and trauma.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-31 10:32:17+00:00; ;1454758114197135366;en;350;3;12;44;Twitter for iPhone;"So don’t give me “are they really autistic or are they just traumatised?”

column1: Don’t give me “does this really help women?”
Don’t give me “late diagnosis is just victim blaming.”
Late diagnosis HELPS autistic women stop the cycle of abuse
column2: rape and assault.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-31 10:32:16+00:00; ;1454758112993370112;en;249;0;2;23;Twitter for iPhone;"Diagnosis isn’t “victim blaming” or “excusing” - IT IS EMPOWERING.

column1: None of it is our fault - not the failure to diagnose
column2: nor the way we’re treated
column3: nor the traumas we go through.

column1: But knowing can help us look after ourselves better. /10"

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-31 10:32:16+00:00; ;1454758111647092737;en;249;0;2;30;Twitter for iPhone;"But you know what diagnosis means?

column1: It means you can stop blaming yourself. You can start implementing boundaries and strategies to protect yourself.
You can begin processing your history within a new framework and understanding of yourself. /9"

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-31 10:32:16+00:00; ;1454758110288097280;en;220;0;1;24;Twitter for iPhone;"And nobody believes us.
nobody believes our experiences because they’re outside the “normal” experiences of NT women. They often make no sense to NTs.
that includes psychologists and police. /8"

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-31 10:32:15+00:00; ;1454758109080076289;en;225;1;2;27;Twitter for iPhone;"In moments of danger
column3: we often disassociate
column4: physically and mentally.

column1: We attract sociopaths and narcissists who realise how easy we are to gaslight.
We avoid change at all costs
column2: so we’ll often stay even if it’s damaging/traumatic/killing us. /7"

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-31 10:32:15+00:00; ;1454758107943522309;en;219;1;1;20;Twitter for iPhone;"Relationships with other humans are hard anyway

column2: for everything
column3: all the time.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-31 10:32:15+00:00; ;1454758106727059456;en;220;0;1;21;Twitter for iPhone;"We don’t trust ourselves
column3: because we’ve been told we’re “wrong” about everything
column4: all our lives.

column1: We’re often desexualised (even pre-diagnosis) and seen as childlike
column2: so not given proper sexual education.

column1: We base our knowledge of sex off of books and films. /5"

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-31 10:32:15+00:00; ;1454758105619877889;en;244;0;3;29;Twitter for iPhone;"We don’t understand social rules
column3: which means we’re too busy working out if a situation is “normal” or not to react in our own interests.

column2: which can mean slow to act/protect ourselves/get away.

column1: We’re masking so hard we ignore our own danger signals. /4"

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-31 10:32:14+00:00; ;1454758104487374848;en;275;2;6;35;Twitter for iPhone;"Autistic women and girls are vulnerable for multiple reasons.
so we miss red flags and danger signs.

column1: We assume everyone tells the truth
column2: so we are easily manipulated.
which makes it hard to run. /3"

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-31 10:32:14+00:00; ;1454758103346470912;en;278;2;1;36;Twitter for iPhone;"If you’re looking at a high rate of autistic women with sexual abuse history

column1: It’s because we are statistically more likely to be abused/raped/assaulted/manipulated.
Diagnosis doesn’t make this worse. It makes it better. /2"

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-19 14:48:11+00:00; ;1450473858860036101;en;4;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@Ziltoidia @RyanHendry94 The thing is - being articulate isn’t a mask. Smiling isn’t (always) a mask. Being positive isn’t a mask. They’ve made autism out to be something in their heads that it either isn’t or doesn’t have to be
column3: and then blame us for not sticking to their rules.

It’s almost like their position as autistic people overshadows the fact that they’re also men and also white - people don’t correct them.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 18:04:34+00:00; ;1450160892876926977;en;4;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@OdetteLis @LauraFMcConnell @MxOolong @commaficionado @Sara_Rose_G @milton_damian @DrAmyPearson @JodieSmitten @MichaelBarton22 I cannot wrap my head around how the test has ANYTHING to do with empathy. In any way. Communication breakdown between two different neurotypes? Sure. But how do you have “empathy” for dolls or marbles? No shame there!!!

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. He never stopped speaking
column3: but if I tried to interrupt he told me I was “taking all the air time”.😂

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. An absolute refusal to understand that I may have had an extremely traumatic past AND still be able to write books (I mean…). It’s bewildering.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 17:57:51+00:00; ;1450159202245173256;en;50;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;@ChaosCastleUK Interesting. There’s intersection for sure (yes

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 17:56:29+00:00; ;1450158859163783169;en;6;0;4;0;Twitter for iPhone;@newrulesnewlife @mouthygurl Except to the best of my memory
column3: I have never been randomly attacked by an autistic woman. And god knows we all struggle. So why is it men?

People will literally create accounts so they can send me anonymous abuse. It’s very weird and unpleasant.

There.” It’s not about empathy and never was - it’s about shit NT communication.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 17:46:53+00:00; ;1450156443513102338;en;9;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;@mouthygurl They’re furious

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 17:45:48+00:00; ;1450156173328531457;en;5;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@Frances_Larina @ZeroWrites @WordsmithKK @LauraFMcConnell I think they’re often just inherently illogical. NTs *think* they understand what they’re asking
column3: but they’re actually missing all the information we need to make a decision.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 17:43:52+00:00; ;1450155685556195330;en;5;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@ZeroWrites @Frances_Larina @WordsmithKK @LauraFMcConnell Never a truer word spoken. 😂

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 17:43:34+00:00; ;1450155608137682946;en;645;7;70;27;Twitter for iPhone;"I naively assumed when I was open about my autism diagnosis
column3: the vast majority of online abuse
column4: harassment and trolling would come from NTs.

column1: Almost *all* of it comes from autistic men
column2: and I’m still trying to work out why."

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 17:37:50+00:00; ;1450154168048627717;en;28;0;3;1;Twitter for iPhone;@Frances_Larina @WordsmithKK @LauraFMcConnell It’s the Neurotypical Gaze. Much like the Male Gaze
column3: it’s very difficult to separate it out: the entire world is steeped in it.

column3: but I always hope I know how to back down when I do.

The fucking irony of this man.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 15:31:01+00:00; ;1450122253098684418;en;0;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@StephenWicks83 Tell me you’re joking?

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 15:17:33+00:00; ;1450118863547473929;en;9;1;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@MonsieurBloop @charliclement_ Yes
column3: I remember you now. This is not the first time you’ve been aggressive as fuck towards me. We’re not arguing - we’re agreeing and listening to what we’re being told. Kindly take your aggressive white maleness away.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 14:29:19+00:00; ;1450106725625999360;en;3;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@LauraFMcConnell @MxOolong @commaficionado @Sara_Rose_G @milton_damian @DrAmyPearson @JodieSmitten @MichaelBarton22 I respond so “accurately” that it “lacks authenticity” and “sounds fake”. 😭 Luckily those who love me well understand that when I start making a “To Do” list for them it means I love them too. 😂

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 14:22:51+00:00; ;1450105099104161794;en;5;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@LauraFMcConnell @MxOolong @commaficionado @Sara_Rose_G @milton_damian @DrAmyPearson @JodieSmitten @MichaelBarton22 It’s exhausting. I have to consciously remember to nod and say the right thing
column3: and I’m so busy working out if I’m making the right noises I look distracted and they accuse me of not being interested.😂

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 14:15:32+00:00; ;1450103254633877511;en;6;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@LauraFMcConnell @MxOolong @commaficionado @Sara_Rose_G @milton_damian @DrAmyPearson @JodieSmitten @MichaelBarton22 Also I often find pragmatic language a barrier to connection - if someone I love is hurting
column3: I will always offer a solution instead of sympathy. This can lead them to believe I don’t care
column4: when I do: my ND way of showing love is just different.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 14:13:38+00:00; ;1450102778366398465;en;5;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@LauraFMcConnell @MxOolong @commaficionado @Sara_Rose_G @milton_damian @DrAmyPearson @JodieSmitten @MichaelBarton22 Makes a lot of sense to me
column3: and something I struggle with too. I am VERY literal: my brain runs in straight lines
column4: and I misunderstand constantly (despite strong grasp of language). I’d be the doll that got it wrong too
column5: I think.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 13:34:19+00:00; ;1450092882099064832;en;6;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@dreddiknight @veganlovebunny @charliclement_ Yeah it took a few minutes to delete but I realised pretty quickly that what I was saying was wrong and offensive. I’ve learnt my lesson.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 13:15:33+00:00; ;1450088162269802496;en;15;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@MonsieurBloop @charliclement_ Why is it weird? I tweeted something ignorant in conversation and got called out on it. I’ve apologised because it was wrong. Genuinely interested in what a more appropriate response would be.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 13:14:07+00:00; ;1450087800368508931;en;5;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;@dreddiknight @veganlovebunny @charliclement_ I agree
column3: and it was me that said it. It wasn’t a general comment: a Uni academic published a paper attacking autistic women and I was ignorant to infer he would be fired by the Uni if he wrote the same things about race. It was stupid
column4: I apologise and I won’t compare again.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 12:54:21+00:00; ;1450082824883683332;en;7;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@LdEsq58 @FiendyCasper Please put this tweet on a T-shirt so women know to stay away from you
column3: if they don’t already.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 11:42:46+00:00; ;1450064811581132805;en;16;0;3;0;Twitter for iPhone;@NancyDoylePsych @LauraFMcConnell I’ve honestly felt bad since I wrote it yesterday - it took about three minutes to realise it was a fucking stupid thing to say and delete it
column3: but the damage was done. I’m hoping I’ll be less stupid going forward.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 11:35:54+00:00; ;1450063084090007557;en;30;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@LauraFMcConnell I said exactly what she quoted - there was a paper by a big French academic that degraded autistic women
column3: and I falsely implied that if he said it about people of colour he’d be fired. But it was a shitty thing to say
column4: and she was right to call me out on it.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 11:17:37+00:00; ;1450058480845475844;en;126;1;6;3;Twitter for iPhone;"So this is a sub-tweet aimed at me
column3: and I feel I should apologise.  I *did* write this in anger and deleted it a few minutes later when I realised what I was saying.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 11:10:04+00:00; ;1450056581035483138;en;49;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;@charliclement_ Yeah
column3: I’m aware that this is a sub-tweet at me. I did write that to someone
column4: and deleted it a few minutes later as I realised it was totally not okay. I feel really bad about it
column5: so I’m really sorry. It was my mistake and I won’t do it again.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 10:25:43+00:00; ;1450045422433718272;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@LenoxLaney @ItsEmilyKaty @AutisticPb It’s her best book
column3: by far. There’s something so cinematic about it. I regularly Google it to see if anything is happening with the film rights.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-18 10:24:58+00:00; ;1450045233585000451;en;1;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;@sphietje Yes! Very traumatising for me too

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-10 14:05:29+00:00; ;1447201624343126023;en;34;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;@AnnMemmott @commaficionado It’s erasure from not just history

column4: music
column5: science
column6: philosophy
column7: literature… Eradicating the past of a minority is key to retaining power and “othering”. It’s not just fun conjecture - it is repositioning our own narrative.

column3: musical
column4: artistic
column5: medical
column6: psychological… We need to see ourselves too - children and adults alike. It’s not a luxury - it’s an essential.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. column4: the implication we are all on a large scale autistic spectrum… No. This is not writing I can get behind.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-10 10:15:19+00:00; ;1447143700920995843;en;1;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@SparklyB @NazimHikmet_0 I’d agree. If you think that autism is simply an extension of basic human traits and everyone “has it on some level” you’ve misunderstood neurology and it’s difficult to trust an article written about it.

From my experience
column3: I spent my life tying myself into knots trying to make sure nobody got angry with me as a self-protection strategy. It makes sense that we avoid confrontation when we’ve spent a life being traumatised.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. column3: although it’s always mind boggling. In which case it’s even MORE important to support historical evidence of autism. To prove it isn’t shameful.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. column1: Autistic people have been erased from history for the sheer purpose of dismissing and eradicating us while deleting our input into the shaping of mankind.
Identifying our people in history helps change the narrative of us as “burdens”."

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. column3: but it’s not what I meant. I didn’t mean commercially viable “value” you can sell. I mean all of it. We ALL have value. Every single autistic person.

column4: medicine
column5: academia. Anywhere with the potential for power and money.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-10 08:33:08+00:00; ;1447117986310021122;en;12;0;0;1;Twitter for iPhone;@AnnMemmott @yrieithydd Totally. I love @JoanneLimburg book on our existence way before there was a word for it.

column1: We’d have been wiped out as evolutionary duds.

Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 16:40:04+00:00; ;1446878136440868868;en;127;0;2;1;Twitter for iPhone;"So let’s assume that different neurology is an evolutionary advantage to humans as a group
column3: which is why it has survived for millions of years.

column1: I don’t believe that our ancestors didn’t value the ND brain and what it could do
column2: and protect it fiercely.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 16:40:01+00:00; ;1446878127058309121;en;143;0;5;6;Twitter for iPhone;"Neurodivergent brains may have been a minority
column3: but they could do what neurotypical brains could not.

column1: Whether it was smell/hear danger far away
column2: sense a change in environment
column3: watch for predators
column4: strategise group movements…

column1: Autistic brains had an important role. /8 https://t.co/vrBBIavm5Q"

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 16:39:59+00:00; ;1446878118136909833;en;154;1;6;5;Twitter for iPhone;"But what if you need someone to focus for sixteen hours straight
column3: plan
column4: observe
column5: organise the cave rock collections? Autistic monotropic brains would have been absolutely essential.

column1: The differing neurologies would have - together - made the group stronger.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 16:39:57+00:00; ;1446878108989206529;en;131;1;2;6;Twitter for iPhone;"In humans
column3: polytropic (neurotypical) and monotropic (autistic) brains have very different (often opposing) strengths and weaknesses.

column1: Ie. For the ability to multi-task
column2: build social bonds
column3: work as a team etc - the dominant NT brain is perfectly suited.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 16:39:55+00:00; ;1446878098708914178;en;166;1;7;7;Twitter for iPhone;"So what about neurodiversity?

column1: What if our brains are specifically wired differently for exactly the same reason?
What if they always have been?
What if it’s actually excellent evolution
column2: and to the benefit and survival of the entire species? /5 https://t.co/kDuGzHBpHl"

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 16:39:52+00:00; ;1446878089691140102;en;128;1;2;5;Twitter for iPhone;"Millions of years of evolution have gone into our wiring.
some of us are Night Owls and others Morning Larks because taking different sleep shifts meant minimum time for the group to all be asleep and vulnerable.
and we are the products. /4 https://t.co/UmQ9JW9dVk"

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 16:39:50+00:00; ;1446878080220422149;en;107;0;1;4;Twitter for iPhone;"As a species
column3: we benefit from diversity which has been tweaked and honed for millions of years.

column1: Humans are historically pack animals (we’re physically weak and needed strength in numbers).
So the diversity of a group has always been essential for survival. /3 https://t.co/Wlodoet75C"

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 16:39:48+00:00; ;1446878070510600206;en;113;0;4;3;Twitter for iPhone;"(Caveat - I’m not a scientist
column3: and I’m focusing on autism because I know it better.)

column2: right?
diversity is what helps a species flourish. Biodiversity is vital to maintain a healthy ecosystem.

column1: (This MUST have been written about in depth by scientists

column1: And I have some theories. /1 https://t.co/VtyIO1z4Jx"

column3: that’s what’s been tricky. Other synesthetes often have more… internal connections. If that makes sense? Whereas mine are visible and literal. To an annoying
column4: stop fucking waking me up level. 😂

column3: like being in an actual storm.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 13:35:56+00:00; ;1446831799045402634;en;2;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@C_Eglinton Same!! I can hear an envelope being posted four floors down

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 13:35:07+00:00; ;1446831595680411648;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@gwyrdhanmor I’m not a scientist but given the stats linking synesthesia to autism
column3: I really don’t think your doctor was on the money there. Deprivation of oxygen won’t cause your brain to turn sound into light. It was wired that way because you’re autistic.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. column3: that one. ☺️

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. I didn’t even realise it was a thing not everybody had until a few years ago. And it took me until THIS YEAR to realise that i don’t just see lights in the dark - they’re there when it’s light too
column3: which is why I often hit overwhelm.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. column4: that’s the other side of the coin.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 13:16:10+00:00; ;1446826825947226115;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@Vassago1911 I’m sorry

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 13:15:17+00:00; ;1446826601526829057;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@gwyrdhanmor I have that too! Also sound to light

column4: but it’s a pretty awesome place nonetheless. ❤️😂

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 13:11:26+00:00; ;1446825635016585220;en;81;0;5;5;Twitter for iPhone;"So while it can be overwhelming and painful
column3: frightening and excluding…

column1: I also don’t want to forget about the beauty and happiness those same senses can bring us too.
I don’t want to overlook the magic.
We are more than a set of deficits. /5 https://t.co/3Z7s8cQOIv"

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 13:11:23+00:00; ;1446825622442057730;en;73;0;2;4;Twitter for iPhone;"And this sensitivity means autistic people see and explore the world in a different way: with our senses
column3: our fingers
column4: our noses
column5: our eyes. We can find a level of sensory happiness that is life-defining.

column2: we are MORE in touch with the world around us
column3: not less. /4 https://t.co/9LbwZGKneW"

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 13:11:21+00:00; ;1446825612258185222;en;80;0;3;5;Twitter for iPhone;"For me
column3: I see everything in tiny detail. I smell everything
column4: hear everything. My autistic brain cannot filter so I get all of it
column5: all at once.

column1: I get strong physical and emotional sensations from small things - a cold tile
column2: a fluffy sock
column3: a clean note
column4: a beautiful colour. /3 https://t.co/kcvTdPZ4SQ"

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 13:11:19+00:00; ;1446825603534045185;en;72;3;2;5;Twitter for iPhone;"Autistic bodies and brains deal with sensory input differently
column3: and while it can hurt and hinder us
column4: it can also be a source of great beauty and joy.

column1: Life is constantly turned up to eleven.
And while it is often overwhelming
column2: it can be kind of magical too. /2 https://t.co/zrQXUf0sXd"

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 13:11:16+00:00; ;1446825593476161542;en;138;2;6;33;Twitter for iPhone;"We talk a lot about autistic sensory issues
column3: and (rightly) how they cause pain
column4: distress
column5: meltdowns and larger issues like problems with employment

Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 05:58:03+00:00; ;1446716568877113347;en;0;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@RobberGuy @Max_is_lost @twdailysquirrel @aut_nature I would imagine they can be. As long as the same uniform options are available to all (which they aren’t in Japan - it’s v gendered). I used to wear a T-shirt under my shirt to make it less scratchy. Sensory mods are usually allowed
column3: I think.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 05:50:31+00:00; ;1446714673945055236;en;0;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@RobberGuy @Max_is_lost @twdailysquirrel @aut_nature I’m not sure where you’re based
column3: but the U.K. has strict school uniforms
column4: often up to college/Uni too. I’m a fan of them for schools. I was so overwhelmed on non-uniform days I used to have regular meltdowns.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 05:45:20+00:00; ;1446713369868767233;en;0;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@RobberGuy @Max_is_lost @twdailysquirrel @aut_nature I don’t know… I was a teacher in a Japanese school for years and I think the uniform/hair conformity actually takes away a lot of the stress and bullying caused by forcing individuality at such a young age. From my experience
column3: it made it a less stressful environment.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 05:37:48+00:00; ;1446711472453718018;en;0;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@RobberGuy @Max_is_lost @twdailysquirrel @aut_nature This is true. I had a few problems with my assistant there because I’d failed to “read a room”. 😂 I don’t think any country is fully comfortable for autistic people. BUT there are elements of Japanese culture that can make it easier. (I was on my own a lot so that helped.)

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 05:35:24+00:00; ;1446710870395002884;en;0;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@RobberGuy @Max_is_lost @twdailysquirrel @aut_nature It’s not perfect
column3: and obviously the crowds are awful. I found central Tokyo very stressful. But as a culture
column4: I definitely felt more comfortable than I ever have in the west. (Normalise not speaking on public transport.😂)

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 05:33:15+00:00; ;1446710327077490690;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@RobberGuy @Max_is_lost @twdailysquirrel @aut_nature I can see that would be an issue - I didn’t really speak Japanese very well so I wasn’t really subject to the same expectations! Although failure to say what you mean has it’s comfort when it’s consistent - I found you learn the rules.  ADHD wouldn’t work well I don’t think.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 05:30:48+00:00; ;1446709710254714884;en;0;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@RobberGuy @Max_is_lost @twdailysquirrel @aut_nature I also forgot the tiny stuff
column3: like quietness (especially on public transport)
column4: shoes off inside
column5: respect within school
column6: aesthetic focus (everything is made beautiful and tactile)
column7: no public displays of affection… ugh I miss it!

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 05:28:44+00:00; ;1446709191968796676;en;0;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@RobberGuy @Max_is_lost @twdailysquirrel @aut_nature Yes but social rules are far more rigid. Which means that when they’re learnt
column3: they’re far easier to stick to. Western social rules are far more open to interpretation which is stressful.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-09 05:27:28+00:00; ;1446708872455012354;en;0;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@RobberGuy @Max_is_lost @twdailysquirrel @aut_nature I’m actually thinking about it anyway as I’d like to write a thread! Eye contact is frowned upon
column3: social rules and hierarchy are rigid (easy to learn)
column4: senses catered for
column5: cleanliness and punctuality paramount
column6: order important. The list is endless.

column1: I've been lucky because both my therapist and my psychologist were very up to date and swallowed no bullshit. Self-awareness is a common trait: we've spent our lives trying to work ourselves and the world out."

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-05 17:47:58+00:00; ;1445445676058300417;en;2;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;@gwyrdhanmor @RobHanna85 @edgar_a_bitch It's not really control when you can't let go of it. I can be in immense pain and on the outside: NOTHING. It's not a choice or a decision I'm making. It's just how I am and always have been.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-05 17:44:36+00:00; ;1445444829089964037;en;3;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;@gwyrdhanmor @RobHanna85 @edgar_a_bitch Yeah
column3: I didn't mean I was emotionless. I just mean I don't cry. Much
column4: anyway. There's a big difference between the inside and the outside.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. column3: therefore anyone autistic is automatically discounted because it affects them. Which elevates non-autistic voices to power
column4: which pushes us back down again.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-05 17:34:48+00:00; ;1445442359198633984;en;3;0;1;0;Twitter Web App;@RobHanna85 @edgar_a_bitch I'll usually stare while I'm processing/feeling their sadness/trying to understand where their sadness comes from/how to solve it/what I can do to help and THEN I remember that NTs expect more than staring and apparently it makes me a monster. 😂

column3: trawling through the othering
column4: the disordering
column5: the eugenics appeals
column6: the hero complexes
column7: the gaslighting. Ten minutes in and I'm distressed and nearing meltdown. No fucking wonder we avoid it.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-05 17:30:50+00:00; ;1445441362065825794;en;16;0;0;0;Twitter Web App;@nubbinsmcgee I do agree with that
column3: but I think that 'negative emotion' is way too unspecific. Sadness is very different to anger
column4: and they've lumped them together. Which is so un-scientific I want to throw them out the window.

column1: We empathise more but we also *have* to focus on negative emotions to protect ourselves from the impact of NTs with negative emotions.

column5: so they get missed. The stats we are constantly given are not accurate of autism as a whole.

column3: but the aim shouldn’t be to eradicate disability. A person in a wheelchair is no less disabled because there are ramps. It’s about how you look at disability
column4: not removing it as a concept.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-04 17:48:32+00:00; ;1445083429943525380;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@Wordbird It needs to remain a disability
column3: because all the things you’re talking about - ways to make life easier for autistic people - come from disability acceptance. Otherwise we all get the same. What it doesn’t mean is that a) it’s lesser or b) it’s a disorder to be changed.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-04 17:44:26+00:00; ;1445082399122104332;en;1;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@Wordbird That’s not the same thing though. What we are talking about here is a dislike of the word “disabled”
column3: and sadly that’s ableism caused by society. There is *nothing* wrong with being disabled.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. column3: because without that a lot of us will not get the support we desperately need. I personally struggle immensely on a sensory basis. But I agree it’s a difference of the brain
column4: not a disorder. The world is not built for us.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 14:12:01+00:00; ;1443941776566493184;en;0;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@sallonsax Whhhaat! That’s not okay.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 14:11:46+00:00; ;1443941713047871493;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@Luasaigh1 I know. 😭 That’s so awful. I try to remind myself it was a different time and they didn’t realise the impact. My doctor - who knew me from birth - told me “my brain was wired differently and that’s okay”. He LITERALLY told me I was neurodivergent and I didn’t get it. 😞

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 14:08:03+00:00; ;1443940779165106205;en;2;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@AutisticCallum_ I get angry and frightened if they attempt to hit on me
column3: even if I find them hot. Although that’s also a *lot* of trauma
column4: not just autism. 😭 (Possibly also a shifting sexuality.)

column2: but I appreciate their kindness all the same.) https://t.co/2482imPrOC"

I’m not blaming her - I’m guessing she very much wants not to offend anyone and she’s coming from a good place. But she’s been listening to the wrong people.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 13:54:46+00:00; ;1443937437168844807;en;14;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@CaninePawtonomy Hahah nah - he was very chatty

column4: fixing a table and generally being very sweet and neurotypical. 😂

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 13:54:03+00:00; ;1443937257002573830;en;100;1;8;1;Twitter for iPhone;"My Year 4 teacher made me “Cupboard Monitor”.

column1: It involved going into a dark cupboard every lunch time and organising the contents.
I genuinely spent my life thinking this was a real role. 😂

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 12:37:59+00:00; ;1443918112471064615;en;2;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@anniehall1973 Very early days - congrats! Take your time - there is NO rush. 💕

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 12:37:17+00:00; ;1443917937543421956;en;44;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;@autisticexplor1 It’s totally individual and varies. Some of mine have lasted my entire life
column3: some fluctuate (months on
column4: months off)
column5: some I test out
column6: get bored and abandon. There isn’t a set way - it’s monotropism so it depends how your brain latches on!

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 12:30:11+00:00; ;1443916149465432067;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@Outafter_dark Thank you. It takes YEARS to unpick those traumas
column3: whether taught formally or just through societal pressure. There’s nothing wrong with ANY of those natural ways of being. 💕

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 12:29:21+00:00; ;1443915942430449676;en;2;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@AthosAp @afairweather @TheOtherG1 I had this a couple of days ago. I also had “excuse me but I have many autistic friends and you do not seem to be anything like them so…” https://t.co/y89f7TxC3j

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 12:28:14+00:00; ;1443915659688222722;en;1;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@afairweather @AthosAp @TheOtherG1 I don’t think it’s something most of us get upset about if it’s by accident. It’s when you correct them and explain
column3: and they say “umm excuse me but my child/friend/colleague/fish is autistic and THEY ARE A PERSON SO I KNOW” that we kick off. 😂

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 12:22:09+00:00; ;1443914128792424451;en;0;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@afairweather @AthosAp @TheOtherG1 It’s true

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 12:19:38+00:00; ;1443913494458417158;en;3;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@afairweather @TheOtherG1 Absolutely - the autistic person can choose. But when it’s 80% in favour of identity first
column3: that should be the default unless corrected (or asked first).

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 12:18:39+00:00; ;1443913247451721730;en;8;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@SearlsDiane I had no lines. Non-verbal 95% of the time
column3: innit. 😂

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 12:06:13+00:00; ;1443910120128323595;en;3;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@afairweather @TheOtherG1 We don’t though. YOU folks make the call. And it’s not pedantry - it’s neurology. You cannot separate it from a person - it’s literally how you’re wired.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 12:00:01+00:00; ;1443908559557832704;en;4;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@sentient_water They really do. 😂😂😂

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 11:54:30+00:00; ;1443907170567921672;en;3;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@sallonsax He looks quite chirpy and happy actually.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 11:48:22+00:00; ;1443905627563122693;en;373;3;24;12;Twitter for iPhone;The man who just served me coffee is attractive so I’ve made sure he knows by making no eye contact
column3: not smiling
column4: staring into the distance as if he doesn’t exist
column5: not letting him touch my hand and refusing to partake in attempts at a conversation. https://t.co/KKpwRetQWN

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 11:41:11+00:00; ;1443903817322573824;en;2;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@Anya33440265 It’s more than okay - it’s incredibly fucking brave. Masking pain is such a huge expectation forced on us
column3: and going through pain to fit in better is not okay but so common. You are being a fucking warrior. 💕💕💕

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 11:38:33+00:00; ;1443903155411034116;en;8;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@anniehall1973 💕💕💕 There is loads more so add your own! And remember - only when and where you’re safe and it makes you feel good.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 11:37:43+00:00; ;1443902946375262212;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@Anya33440265 Exactly!!! Fuck yes!! 💕

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 11:35:21+00:00; ;1443902352474390531;en;2;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@ThegirlintheB Yes
column3: I’m aware that it’s not always easy
column4: or doable. But I think we ALL have areas we can unmask in
column5: even if it’s just at home
column6: or with loved ones. Unmasking doesn’t have to be all the time

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. column1: But think we can ALL find places to unmask
column2: even if it’s at home on our own."

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 11:18:48+00:00; ;1443898186469462022;en;110;0;8;16;Twitter for iPhone;"It’s important to clarify that you should only unmask IF and WHEN it feels safe to do so.

column1: We are under no obligation to do so
column2: and it’s a privilege.
it’s okay to unmask and mask whenever and wherever you want to. You don’t “owe” ANYONE the real you. 💕 https://t.co/tCZo5scjW4"

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 11:11:53+00:00; ;1443896444662976542;en;3;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@NortherlyRose That too!! Allowing myself to feel what I feel

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 10:52:46+00:00; ;1443891634219982848;en;190;2;14;5;Twitter for iPhone;"Ooh! Forgot to add:

column1: - Stimming. I now enjoy and celebrate it
column2: rather than hiding it in shame

column1: - Eye contact. I’m allowing myself not to do it when it feels painful/uncomfortable
- Special Interests. I’m leaning in and rejoicing in them.
- I am non-verbal when I need to be. https://t.co/n2jyXPb8F0"

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 09:09:43+00:00; ;1443865700284747787;en;103;2;3;14;Twitter for iPhone;"Imagine saying “people with gay”

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 09:07:31+00:00; ;1443865149178368014;en;1;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@mystheodora I don’t know I’m afraid! It’s a very personal decision.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 09:06:10+00:00; ;1443864809255153664;en;332;2;20;71;Twitter for iPhone;"It would be so great if people talking about autism in the media would stop saying “people with autism” five hundred times a second.

column1: It isn’t a hat you can take off

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 08:30:56+00:00; ;1443855939212398604;en;259;0;14;22;Twitter for iPhone;"So unmask
column3: my autistic comrades.

column2: let go
column3: stop pretending - slowly
column4: at your own pace
column5: where you feel safe and comfortable.

column1: And share your journey and tips below so we can help each other be ourselves. 💕

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 08:30:53+00:00; ;1443855929661956096;en;267;1;2;19;Twitter for iPhone;"Unmasking is not an easy process. It’s taking me solid investment
column3: therapy
column4: hard work
column5: self-reflection.

column1: Some people don’t like it (I am “behaving more autistic now”).
But for the first time in forty years
column2: I’m starting to remember who I am.
is it WORTH IT. /9 https://t.co/RvA8Iorrrl"

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 08:30:51+00:00; ;1443855919767556096;en;215;0;1;10;Twitter for iPhone;"And it has been LIFE CHANGING.

column1: Social anxiety and mental health issues are way down. My body is in less pain
column2: and I sleep and eat better.
calm and stable than I have ever been before.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 08:30:49+00:00; ;1443855909948739599;en;191;0;1;7;Twitter for iPhone;"- I ask for clear instructions
column3: time to process
column4: written rather than verbal communication

column1: - I ask for quiet and space
- I do not tolerate being treated poorly (even if it sometimes makes me a bit aggressive - I’m working on it)
- I allow myself to be as “weird” as I am. /7 https://t.co/huce4hTygI"

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 08:30:46+00:00; ;1443855900113047553;en;191;1;1;4;Twitter for iPhone;"- I am no longer “mirroring” as much. (I’ve mostly stopped auto-copying the expressions
column3: movements
column4: speech and attitudes of those around me.)

column1: - I am honest with those I love
- And I tell them when I need something
- Or when I need them to go away /6 https://t.co/Pef7SL3q3h"

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 08:30:44+00:00; ;1443855889572802560;en;207;1;1;12;Twitter for iPhone;"- I don’t force myself to socialise if I don’t want to

column1: - And I rest when I’m overwhelmed
- I trust who I know I am over who others tell me I am (this is brand new)
- I believe in my empathy and compassion without trying to “perform them” so others know they’re there /5 https://t.co/q31jWb1MTX"

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 08:30:42+00:00; ;1443855881112801284;en;209;0;3;6;Twitter for iPhone;"- My language is returning to its natural form: blunt
column3: direct
column4: without caveats. (OMG it feels delicious.)

column1: - And I no longer internalise it. My neurological difference to you is not my problem

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 08:30:40+00:00; ;1443855872539648004;en;233;0;2;8;Twitter for iPhone;"- I no longer tolerate situations that upset me
column3: including sensory overwhelm

column1: - And I am not ashamed to manage pain even if it draws attention
- I don’t people please. At all. I prioritise myself
- I have removed toxic people from my life /3 https://t.co/XAaHIzfsPP"

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 08:30:38+00:00; ;1443855863710732297;en;243;0;1;6;Twitter for iPhone;"- I don’t fake “laugh” just because everyone else is laughing

column1: - But I do laugh if it’s funny even if others aren’t.
- I don’t fake emotions (as often - still working on it)
- I allow myself to be unlikeable instead of faking it to be loveable /2 https://t.co/xEXHRVKQiS"

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-10-01 08:30:35+00:00; ;1443855854726533136;en;760;40;24;134;Twitter for iPhone;"Ways I’ve Stopped Autistic Masking - A Thread

column1: - My face moves less: I no longer consciously animate to look more “human”

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-29 19:03:32+00:00; ;1443290365088485383;en;3;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;"@helloiammariam More importantly
column3: they overlooked repeated warnings
column4: reports
column5: accusations

column1: They didn’t just miss it. They made it happen."

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-29 18:58:12+00:00; ;1443289021241872392;en;1;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@sencogirl @CathyEarlyYears @TVodden @_LisaCherry @connectionwork1 @JamesEdPsych @KimSGolding @PookyH It’s a *bit* about honesty
column3: this is true. But it’s mostly neurology. Our brains are not polytropic - they’re monotropic so they work differently. It isn’t just being honest where other kids aren’t. It’s a brain difference.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-29 18:52:58+00:00; ;1443287706109349889;en;2;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@CathyEarlyYears @TVodden @sencogirl @_LisaCherry @connectionwork1 @JamesEdPsych @KimSGolding @PookyH Yes! I nearly got fired so many times for “not working when I’m not interested”. 😂 The best option is to find what DOES light them up and do more of that. The change will be night and day. I hope that helps! 🥰

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-29 18:48:24+00:00; ;1443286554693210115;en;1;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;@CathyEarlyYears @TVodden @sencogirl @_LisaCherry @connectionwork1 @JamesEdPsych @KimSGolding @PookyH When an autistic person is interested our entire being lights up and focuses completely. It’s all encompassing (monotropic neurology). When there’s nothing of interest
column3: there’s just no… light. No focus. No interest. Our neurology goes “no thanks - next”.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-29 18:40:13+00:00; ;1443284498158964743;en;2;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;@CathyEarlyYears @TVodden @sencogirl @_LisaCherry @connectionwork1 @JamesEdPsych @KimSGolding @PookyH Some things are just boring. If the child is autistic
column3: we have our special interests and if it falls outside that it’s just not very interesting
column4: a lot of the time. Depends on the child and what it is. There’s nothing wrong with them - we just don’t agree with NT “fun”. 😂

column3: “social anxiety” comes from trauma caused by being a ND in a world that abuses you. When I was a kid I had NO social anxiety. Tony is a billionaire who has never been to school and has been surrounded by Yes Men. Why would be socially anxious?

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-28 15:17:42+00:00; ;1442871142121971717;en;0;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@pintsizedMB @BovineSaintly I don’t know about other autistic people
column3: but I didn’t know what a meltdown or burnout WAS until I was diagnosed - I found other words to make sense of them. Also
column4: you can have a burnout that tops all other burnouts - then it WOULD be a first. No?

column1: Welcome to the world as created by an autistic person. 💙"

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 20:53:59+00:00; ;1442593382006677506;en;31;0;4;0;Twitter for iPhone;@commaficionado Fact: every neurotypical person who has ever walked into an autistic person’s house has gone “OH MY GOD I WANT TO LIVE HERE”.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 20:38:31+00:00; ;1442589490061656064;en;2;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@thatspygirl @MrsCMS78 It’s so impressive that you’re listening and care so much. 😍 Also remind him dyspraxia is not a barrier to success - I’ve written eleven novels without “writing” a single word. He will smash it. 🥰

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 20:31:35+00:00; ;1442587744945930244;en;2;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@thatspygirl @MrsCMS78 Honestly I’m only recently diagnosed so I’m still working it out myself. Definitely scrap anything that requires handwriting - type or speak everything. The pain is so bad you can’t possibly focus on the answer.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 19:55:06+00:00; ;1442578564344426497;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@mancbird I got what you meant!! NT education is designed for NT brains
column3: not ND. You could put Einstein in a regular GCSE programme with no support and he’d struggle
column4: I reckon.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 19:54:04+00:00; ;1442578307141156868;en;3;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@donnaclayPB Instead of everyone having to do it themselves (although at least it make the community even stronger).

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 19:24:59+00:00; ;1442570984553385990;en;0;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@mancbird If it’s specifically maths
column3: it might be worth looking at dyscalculia too (the numbers version of dyslexia). I have it and it makes maths very hard.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 19:23:36+00:00; ;1442570636266590213;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@leticia_creates I’ve no idea either. 😂

Thanks.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 17:55:00+00:00; ;1442548343029260292;en;1;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@claireLTdoodle @TJNewton177 I went for a private clinical assessment
column3: but you have to pay. First stop should be your GP.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 17:53:48+00:00; ;1442548039785328644;en;2;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@JasonLuxemburg2 I’m actually hyperlexic and dyspraxic
column3: so the opposite of dyslexic. They’re really not that related at all.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 17:53:01+00:00; ;1442547841109348357;en;2;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@buntopolis @Fontsensitive Umm
column3: it’s not environmental factors either. It’s genetic diversity that’s been around for millions of years and a good thing. Chemicals in rivers do not cause neurodivergency either.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 17:05:59+00:00; ;1442536008025788416;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@buntopolis It’s a mystery but I’ve been sent multiple messages this week along those lines. One said that autistic kids were a result of absent parents “putting them in front of the tv”. Mind blowing.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 17:04:54+00:00; ;1442535734376816644;en;0;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@JasonLuxemburg2 They’re actually very different if you know what you’re looking for
column3: but I can see for those who don’t they could be confused.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 15:44:14+00:00; ;1442515431303139328;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@SoQuietOrg @sanguineposhrat Misophonia and autism BOTH were evolutionary advantages - why some scientists keep looking over this is bewildering.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 15:43:34+00:00; ;1442515266596900869;en;2;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@drjanegregory @sanguineposhrat @SoQuietOrg Like ants crawling into your ears and around your entire body. Ugh.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 15:42:15+00:00; ;1442514933338423301;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@sanguineposhrat @SoQuietOrg Ah
column3: but for most of the million years of evolution it would have been a HIGHLY valuable skill
column4: and the world would have been quieter. It’s modern life that’s the issue - not the way we are wired.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 15:31:25+00:00; ;1442512206244032515;en;2;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@SoQuietOrg @sanguineposhrat It’s painful
column3: like I want to rip my skin off with my nails. But all of my senses are too heightened. It’s like the world is magnified and turned up to 11.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 15:27:24+00:00; ;1442511198365253637;en;1;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@sanguineposhrat Maybe! I don’t know - there’s so many types. My main one is sound to light and it is so strong it wakes me up
column3: like fireworks or lightning.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 15:26:03+00:00; ;1442510858568019968;en;2;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@commaficionado My heart. 💙 https://t.co/HPLFvNxpxM

That’s how I feel about it too. It doesn’t *feel* like synesthesia
column3: which I also have
column4: and it feels separate. Look forward to seeing where the studies go! (All my income goes on earplugs.)

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 15:22:59+00:00; ;1442510085641711616;en;9;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;@commaficionado I am SO READY FOR X-MEN CROSSOVER. award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 15:20:13+00:00; ;1442509387495510021;en;3;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;@sanguineposhrat Misophonia is super common among autistic people - I have it too. I don’t agree that misophonia counts as synesthesia though - it doesn’t feel like a crossed sense to me. Otherwise anything = emotion would count. Just my opinion!

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 14:52:10+00:00; ;1442502330469990412;en;1;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@VySaika Yeah! I’m not a psychologist so I can’t say. But I do know that you have to demonstrate a lifetime of physical motor issues to be diagnosed as dyspraxic - otherwise it’s probably something else.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 14:50:52+00:00; ;1442502003972661253;en;2;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@sanguineposhrat Mmm you don’t tend to grow out of synesthesia and it’s quite literal - a literal crossover of senses.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Dyspraxia is a complex neurodivergency - if your hand just jerks
column3: then no. If you have all the other diagnostic criteria
column4: then maybe?

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 14:46:32+00:00; ;1442500912778563586;en;2;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@VySaika If you have those symptoms but not the physical ones

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 14:41:45+00:00; ;1442499707792621573;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@sanguineposhrat Synesthesia is a cross over of senses
column3: so light to sound
column4: sound to colour etc.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 13:57:56+00:00; ;1442488680984334340;en;3;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@Miiss__P More importantly

column1: I may have pink hair and the face of an adorable cartoon frog -
But if you message me with the diabolical opinion that neurodivergency is a result of bad parenting -
I WILL rip you apart with my soft little T-Rex hands.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 13:27:56+00:00; ;1442481132721737735;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@ChristinaRaoul @Asher_Wolf Okay
column3: I am done now. I don’t think you realise how deeply offensive you are being.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 13:27:13+00:00; ;1442480951657910273;en;1;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@ChristinaRaoul @Asher_Wolf What is cz?

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 12:35:19+00:00; ;1442467892402929676;en;3;0;0;1;Twitter for iPhone;@SophieT_84 So do I! award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 11:43:35+00:00; ;1442454871995604999;en;2;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@CathleenLKelly Yes I follow @DYSPRAXIAFDTN - they’re great!

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 11:25:39+00:00; ;1442450359314616329;en;0;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;@seeing4d I think that’s what I mean - mental health problems tend to come from a myriad of factors rather than our brain wiring.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 11:06:14+00:00; ;1442445469829910530;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@seeing4d No apologies! NDs do struggle immensely with mental health
column3: but it’s usually a result of living in an NT world as opposed to directly a result of your brain wiring. If that makes sense.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 11:04:19+00:00; ;1442444988059512835;en;1;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;@seeing4d Anger issues and depression aren’t really either dyspraxia or autism - they’re mental health problems that can come from ND trauma
column3: but they’re not “caused” by either.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 10:59:42+00:00; ;1442443825818050560;en;8;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@terreliv @commaficionado Thank you!

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 10:51:00+00:00; ;1442441638584799242;en;2;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@MsTittifanfan “YOU’RE ON YOUR OWN
column3: GOOD LUCK
column4: BYEEEE.”

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 10:50:29+00:00; ;1442441508594982914;en;1;0;3;0;Twitter for iPhone;@seeing4d But dyspraxia isn’t just physical - it also impairs learning.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 10:42:08+00:00; ;1442439407840243714;en;1;0;0;1;Twitter for iPhone;@chaoticpoetic I know. It’s a shambles. 😭 Awareness is paramount
column3: especially so they don’t end up turning into us late diagnosed adults!

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 10:37:36+00:00; ;1442438267513851906;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@chaoticpoetic I’d agree
column3: but I am a late diagnosed dyspraxic adult so in writing about it I am - to adults - I am inherently covering that too. But if we want to avoid late diagnosis
column4: it’s the children we need to focus on.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 10:36:00+00:00; ;1442437861349855237;en;1;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@WolfoxGlace Lol. Good luck to them - I would kick off. 😂

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 10:17:33+00:00; ;1442433218901422081;en;18;0;4;0;Twitter for iPhone;@commaficionado My bad. I was essentially told to go to Twitter. 😂

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 10:17:08+00:00; ;1442433115138387971;en;8;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;@SearlsDiane It’s been so valuable
column3: right? I have a therapist but it’s ridiculous the lack of post-diagnostic support. It’s a case of “here’s some leaflets
column4: there might be a group near you”. 🙄

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 09:59:54+00:00; ;1442428778257342468;en;200;1;22;25;Twitter for iPhone;"Psychologists: “So you’re officially autistic and dyspraxic.”

column1: Me: “Cool. So what do I do now?”

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 09:55:14+00:00; ;1442427604363984897;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@elladwx The same! I am so much kinder to myself now I’m diagnosed
column3: and beat myself up less for… beating myself up. 😂

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 09:45:40+00:00; ;1442425195189391360;en;2;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@BeadyAye @LeishaOBrien10 It’s so much easier for people to assume that all kids work the same and some are stupid
column3: then that children have different brains and might need more support. 🙄

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 09:44:55+00:00; ;1442425008710586371;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@SeamusBrady96 I had no idea until my actual diagnosis session. I was like “why aren’t you making me stand on one leg - why are you giving me brain tests?” 😂

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 09:35:04+00:00; ;1442422527230418945;en;4;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@TheAutisticCre1 @autisticdaydre1 @elsalwilliams I do agree with that. Totally. I wrote a thread about how NT people are really resistant to NDs being heroes instead of victims. Which
column3: given the HUGE ND fandom of Marvel
column4: seems counter intuitive.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 09:31:28+00:00; ;1442421624867807232;en;2;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@LadyDoctorSays Meeee. Also vivid hallucinations 3-4 times a week. Night is a real adventure. 😂

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 09:29:51+00:00; ;1442421216749424641;en;3;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@autisticdaydre1 @TheAutisticCre1 @elsalwilliams Tony Stark = autistic icon

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 08:59:33+00:00; ;1442413593031581697;en;1;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@CoffeeAndCreams It really does. X

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 08:21:23+00:00; ;1442403985755803657;en;1;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@carolinevflee1 @LeishaOBrien10 You’re so welcome. It’s important. X

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 08:20:47+00:00; ;1442403835859853312;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@carolinevflee1 @LeishaOBrien10 That’s very common - neurodivergent boys don’t mask as much (or as well
column3: usually) as girls. It’s up to you
column4: but I’m pretty sure that with a diagnosis you get extra time in exams which may help and may force education to take it seriously.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 08:19:10+00:00; ;1442403428114653186;en;2;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@joeefoster 😭😭😭 I hate that he feels ashamed of who he is. All my love to him.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 07:56:12+00:00; ;1442397650322608132;en;1;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@booksinkbook Dyspraxia doesn’t get talked about enough! 🥰

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES.
