Worth investigating? The good-at-coordination thing may be a spanner but I don’t know enough about diagnosis criteria.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 07:47:47+00:00; ;1442395530844205069;en;1;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@KB_Neal That is a sign you are a great instructor - thank you for reading.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 07:42:22+00:00; ;1442394168819654660;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@booksinkbook Thank you. X

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 07:41:43+00:00; ;1442394001584263173;en;2;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@chaoticpoetic Yes
column3: I agree that it impacts us as adults. I say “especially for kids” because they’re children - we have a duty of care and a responsibility to look after them. Also
column4: grades at school effect your entire life path.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 07:37:02+00:00; ;1442392825853775874;en;1;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;@DyspraxicP People do not understand neurodivergent minds
column3: and it’s a real problem. 😞

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 07:36:16+00:00; ;1442392629971341316;en;5;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@autisticgpshh Exactly. It’s not about intelligence
column3: it’s about how our brains work. I need longer processing time
column4: planning
column5: memory strategies
column6: TOTAL silence… They’re all doable. My brain just likes scaffolding. 😂

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 07:18:39+00:00; ;1442388200568365057;en;0;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@CaomhanKeane Done!

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 00:10:26+00:00; ;1442280432645464068;en;2;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@kellarosa @McTwingles @iamaphextwin No. Although I was born left handed and then trained to use my right. So I guess I originally was
column3: but not anymore.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-27 00:08:39+00:00; ;1442279987252547587;en;1;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@OhmandaTwitch Undiagnosed I’d imagine. It’s relatively specific and unlikely to confuse with much else.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-26 23:20:15+00:00; ;1442267804175007756;en;2;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@SBMsuzyq @HappyHealthSci1 I have to stare at an analogue clock for a solid ten seconds to work out what it’s saying
column3: and then I immediately forget and have to check again. 😅

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-26 23:18:28+00:00; ;1442267358165286915;en;2;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@Shebz26 I am also autistic and it does sound like autism to me
column3: but possibly apraxia of speech if it’s a physical barrier rather than a mental one.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-26 23:13:39+00:00; ;1442266143327195137;en;5;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@KieranRose7 I’m so sorry for your loss.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-26 23:09:36+00:00; ;1442265123356397568;en;0;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@Dramatikat Sure! DM me. X

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-26 23:08:26+00:00; ;1442264830342217732;en;3;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@Shebz26 I’m afraid I don’t know enough about neurology to answer this. Dyspraxia would have to affect a lot more than speech to be diagnosed or it’s a different condition
column3: I believe.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-26 23:05:08+00:00; ;1442264000834588674;en;2;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@laurajjcook It’s very much still relevant for adults. But I think my point is that we have a duty to look out for
column3: identify and diagnose children because they’re children. And school results can affect your entire life.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-26 22:46:32+00:00; ;1442259318393475075;en;1;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@stefoons You can but I’m not an expert! Just a dyspraxic person. There might be more relevant answers from @DyspraxicHelp4U and @DYSPRAXIAFDTN.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-26 22:45:23+00:00; ;1442259032102916097;en;2;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@Emberflux Same. 😂

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-26 22:42:37+00:00; ;1442258333008683014;en;13;0;3;0;Twitter for iPhone;@srelzie I got to uni but struggled immensely (I am autistic too) and got a lower grade than I should have
column3: due to zero support. I am so unsurprised at these findings.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-26 22:40:56+00:00; ;1442257910478905344;en;3;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@Emberflux 🙄 It is frustrating as hell. You only need to take one look at me to see I’m dyspraxic - I can’t control my body
column3: my hands
column4: my face… 😂

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-26 22:39:30+00:00; ;1442257548497752073;en;4;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@CatWineBottles Yes
column3: and there should be educational practices that are applied widely to support. It’s going to take a lot of shouting though.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-26 22:37:25+00:00; ;1442257027565166596;en;5;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@Emberflux I would imagine that is incredibly common. They see the handwriting because that’s obvious
column3: but fail to connect the other dots.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-26 22:35:23+00:00; ;1442256514706665473;en;4;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@martin_m_mcd Couldn’t agree more.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-26 22:10:35+00:00; ;1442250272651325440;en;2;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@LynnAFraser It’s such a stupid
column3: neurotypical way of looking at intelligence. An assumption the brain just “averages out”. How intelligent am I - my strongest bits or my weakest? It’s nonsense.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-26 22:07:37+00:00; ;1442249525696110593;en;1;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@ZOZEYUK I am certain she will be. X

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-26 22:07:11+00:00; ;1442249417956941825;en;2;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@AkhtarSascha I do! I’ve had to work it all out
column3: separate it
column4: seek individual diagnosis… I’m now on the journey for another health condition that was missed and I’m sick and tired of it. 😂

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-26 22:05:37+00:00; ;1442249021314187264;en;2;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@mactavish That’s because it’s how NT brains work - they’re mostly level. It’s ND brains that are spiky
column3: so there’s zero education and nobody takes it into account.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-26 22:03:41+00:00; ;1442248537002098689;en;4;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@ZOZEYUK Absolutely traumatic. I remember being screamed at by a class because I couldn’t catch the netball
column3: and on top of being autistic it was not fun days.

column2: award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-26 22:00:02+00:00; ;1442247616130129923;en;1;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;@LeishaOBrien10 @carolinevflee1 I would add that although official support is so helpful (and should happen) there are strategies that help even without official intervention. I wasn’t diagnosed until 39 so there are still things that can be done in the meantime.

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-26 21:56:46+00:00; ;1442246798144270336;en;3;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@pastiche_graham You look so beautiful! 💕💕💕

award-winning author of GEEK GIRL and THE VALENTINES. Autistic and dyspraxic activist. 🌈💓🧝🏻‍♀️ Agent:@KateJShaw;56673;Paciente;TEA;nan;nan;2021-09-26 21:55:46+00:00; ;1442246542396641280;en;6;0;2;1;Twitter for iPhone;@MikeHester88 It was pretty obvious when I was a kid - everyone kind of knew
column3: but nothing was done. I feel resentful too.

column3: dyspraxia is a full body developmental disorder that affects the brain too. It makes it hard to move your body and also impacts the stuff I wrote in the thread.
